section.name: Fieldsize
section.span: How to define the size for a field in a documenttype.

div.p: In the documenttype 'upcoming', titles may be no more than 60 characters.

section.p: While adding a field to a documenttype that has a size, e.g. a string field or a markedup text field, the maximum size should be defined. For string fields, click below the size title to type the maximal number of characters (far right, in the middle). Fields that may consist of several lines, do not have a single size property, but two, a width and a height (number of characters wide and number of lines heigh). They are set in the same way.
